item.title: Sign highlighting Junction ahead, 15th August
item.description:
The triangular sign highlighting the junction of branch Road has been knocked down however it is also in poor repair so needs replacing. This junction regularly has near misses with people turning out and traffic going to fast around the slight bend. If anything can be done to improve the visibility or signage to make it safer - that would be great Sign has been down for 2 days

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, The Reddings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)
